Judul: UNIT COST AND BREAK EVEN POINT ANALYSIS OF HOME INDUSTRY
Abstrak: The aims from this research are analysis overall cost that spending for speakers assembling. The steps that will implemented is identification and classification the entire of the costs that spend for assembling speakers, measuring unit cost with activitybased costing methods, and then measuring breakeven point.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing: Ir. Drs. H. Arson Aliludin, SE, DEA.
Kata Kunci: Cost Analysis, Management Accounting, Activity-Based Costing
